--- ### @mixin button Can be used inside your own `@mixin button();` and other elements that should behave like a button. No styling is provided. #### Arguments | Name | Type | Default | | ---- | ---- | ------- | | `appearance` | `string` | `none` | | `display` | `string` | `inline-block` | | `vertical-align` | `string` | | `cursor` | `string` | `pointer` | #### SCSS {% highlight css %} .foo { @include button-structure; } {% endhighlight %} #### CSS {% highlight css %} .foo { -webkit-appearance: none; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; cursor: pointer; } {% endhighlight %}
